annotations: K/ATTN : CHARTERING DESK PLEASE SUBMIT YOUR MOST COMPETITIVE FREIGHT OFFER FOR THE FOLLOWING SHIPMENT OF COAL ON OR BEFORE 28.05.2024 1500 HRS IST PREFERABLY WITH NAME TONNAGE ONLY. THE OFFER SHOULD REMAIN VALID TILL NEXT DAY 29.05.2024, SUBSEQUENTLY REVERSE AUCTION TO BE CARRIED OUT AS PER THE OFFERS RECEIVED AS PER BELOW OPTIONS ACC JSPL === OPTION 1 ACC JSPL CARGO : 1,15,000MT+-10% OWNERS OPTION COAL IN BULK LACYAN : 20-25TH JUNE 2024 LOAD PORT : 2 LOAD PORT (HPCT /DBCT  + ABBOT POINT/ RGCT ) OR ABBOT POINT CHARTERERS OPTION FIRST LOAD PORT : HPCT /DBCT  , QTY : 40,000MT +-10%, LOAD RATE : 15,000 MT/DAY .  SHIPPER : BHP, ALL LOAD TERMS AS PER ANNEXURE A AS ATTACHED. SECOND LOAD PORT : ABBOT POINT, QTY : 75,000MT+-10% , LOAD RATE : 35,000MT/DAY SHIPPER : LAKE VERMONT, ALL LOAD TERMS AS PER ANNEXURE B AS ATTACHED. VESSEL TO BE NOMINATED PRIOR TO 18 DAYS OF FIRST DAY OF LAYCAN, DEMURRAGE NON - NEGOTIABLE AS PER ANNEXURE A. DISCHARGE PORT : PARADIP KICTPL BERTH , DISCHARGE RATE : 45,000MT PWWD NIL ADC ...ONLY OUR BROKERAGE
